channel.title: Downloaded Client Problems
channel.description:
So i downloaded my friends Client and this pops up when i try nd Run it
[code] C:\Users\Ron\Desktop>java -Xmx512m -jar SilabClient.jar 0 0 highmem members 0 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
C:\Users\Ron\Desktop>pause Press any key to continue . . .[/code] What do i do to Fix and be able to run the Client.?
i have a 64x Bit Acer
